extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    BIOL330 or BCHM218 or MBIO218 
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from BIOL441; PATH425.

basic.description: Current research in eukaryotic molecular genetics including gene regulation, transformation, cell proliferation and the analysis of development. Specific topics will vary depending on the instructor but will include plant, insect and mammalian genetics.
basic.subject: BIOL
basic.title: Molecular Genetics
